title: Timeless Polki Drop Jhumka
materials: 22K Gold with Uncut Polki Diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Classic drop design featuring three graduated Polki diamond clusters. The top features a circular halo, followed by a smaller round Polki, culminating in a stunning pear-shaped drop. The Polki diamonds are set in a traditional closed setting, enhancing their brilliance and reflecting the rich heritage of South Indian craftsmanship.
colors: Warm gold with the subtle fire of Polki diamonds
occasions: and elegant evening wear. A timeless addition to any bride's trousseau or a cherished heirloom for future generations.
description: Exquisite Polki diamond craftsmanship showcases the timeless elegance of South Indian jewelry. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures lasting brilliance. A statement piece that embodies both tradition and sophisticated style.
